api.InternalError: Server is experiencing some issues, please retry later
api.Unknown: An unknown error occured, please retry later and if the problem persist contact the support
api.PwdLength: Wrong password length, should be between 8 and 34 characters
api.WrongRequest: The parameters sent could not be processed
api.NoCreationAccount: The account could not be created
api.NoMatch: Your email or password didn't match
api.Suspended: Your account was suspended, please contact the support
api.AccountCreatedError: Your account was created but an error occured while trying to create your new profile. Please contact the support
